Commands.Metsu: Group ranged BRV attackSelf: 3 turns SPD Up IBecomes Metsu+ in Wind mode
Commands.Metsu+: Group ranged Wind BRV attack.Self: 3 turns SPD Up I
Commands.Sai: 2-hit melee Wind BRV attack + HP attackSelf: 3 turns ATK Up I; 3 turns Wind modeSai becomes Sai+, BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ in Wind mode
Commands.Sai+: 2-hit melee Wind BRV attack + HP attack.Self: 3 turns ATK Up I; 3 turns Wind mode.BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ in Wind mode

Artifacts.Debuff Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% while an enemy is debuffed.
Artifacts.Storm and Stress Boost: Increases the effects of Storm and Stress by 5%.
Artifacts.Mighty Metsu: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Metsu by 10%.
Artifacts.Mighty Sai: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Sai by 10%.

Passives.Metsu Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Metsu.
Passives.Chase Bonus: Slightly raises BRV damage during a Chase Sequence.
Passives.Debuff Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Sai Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Sai.
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Metsu Charge: Increases the max uses of Metsu by 1.
Passives.Start Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 3 turns when the battle starts.
Passives.Sai Charge: Increases the max uses of Sai by 1.
Passives.Storm and Stress: Slightly raises Initial BRV and Max BRV while in Wind stance.
Passives.Wind Attack Boost Up: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK in Wind mode
Passives.Metsu Extension: Metsu use +1When using Metsu, Metsu+: Slight damage boost Slight SPD Up boost Higher turn rate
Passives.Wind Boost All: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV in Wind mode
Passives.Sai Extension: Sai use +2When using Sai, Sai+: Tremendous BRV damage boost Slight ATK Up boost Party: 6 turns Wind Enchant

Weapons.Fujin's Chakram: Increases the potency of Metsu and Metsu+.Moderately raises BRV damage when there is only one target.Increases the potency of Speed Up, extends its duration and grants it to allies as well.
Weapons.Dazzling Moonring: Increases the potency of Sai and Sai+.Inflicts Wind Resistance Down for 4 turns.Increases the potency of Attack Up and extends its duration.Extends the duration of Wind stance.
